testcase.name: testWoodall_Num_1
testcase.system-out:
Woodall Number
Definition: Woodall number is any natural number 'W_num' that satisfies form W_num = num*(2^num) - 1, num = natural number
1 is a Woodall Number for num = 1

testcase.name: testWoodall_Num_2
testcase.system-out:

testcase.name: testLeyland_Num_1
testcase.system-out:
Leyland Number
Definition: Leyland number 'num' is a number where num = num1^num2 + num2^num1 , num1, num2 = integers greater than 1
2 is not a Leyland number

testcase.name: testPerfect_Num_1
testcase.system-out:
Perfect Number
Definition: The summation of all factors of a given number except itself is equal to the number, then the number is called a Perfect Number.
496 is a Perfect Number

Perfect Number
Definition: The summation of all factors of a given number except itself is equal to the number, then the number is called a Perfect Number.
552 isn't a Perfect Number

testcase.name: testMarkov_Num_1
testcase.system-out:
Markov Number
Definition: Markov number are the positive integers x, y, z that appear in the solution of the Markov Diophantine equation x^2 + y^2 + z^2 = 3xyz
89 is a Markov Number First Triplet Containing the Markov Number: [1 , 34 , 89]

testcase.name: testMarkov_Num_2
testcase.system-out:
Markov Number
Definition: Markov number are the positive integers x, y, z that appear in the solution of the Markov Diophantine equation x^2 + y^2 + z^2 = 3xyz
65 is not a Markov Number

testcase.name: testMarkov_Num_3
testcase.system-out:
Markov Number
Definition: Markov number are the positive integers x, y, z that appear in the solution of the Markov Diophantine equation x^2 + y^2 + z^2 = 3xyz
169 is a Markov Number First Triplet Containing the Markov Number: [2 , 29 , 169]

testcase.name: testNarcissistic_Num_1
testcase.system-out:
Narcissistic Number
Definition: Narcissistic number is a number that is the summation of its digits each raised to the power of the number of digits. It is also called Pluperfect Digital Invariant(PPDI)
57 is not a Narcissistic Number

testcase.name: testNarcissistic_Num_2
testcase.system-out:
Narcissistic Number
Definition: Narcissistic number is a number that is the summation of its digits each raised to the power of the number of digits. It is also called Pluperfect Digital Invariant(PPDI)
153 is a Narcissistic Number

testcase.name: testRamanujan_Num_1
testcase.system-out:
Ramanujan Number
Definition: A number that can be expressed as the summation of two positive cubes in atleast two ways is called a Ramanujan Number.
4104 is a Ramanujan Number

testcase.name: testRamanujan_Num_2
testcase.system-out:
Ramanujan Number
Definition: A number that can be expressed as the summation of two positive cubes in atleast two ways is called a Ramanujan Number.

testcase.name: testRamanujan_Num_3
testcase.system-out:
Ramanujan Number
Definition: A number that can be expressed as the summation of two positive cubes in atleast two ways is called a Ramanujan Number.
1729 is the smallest Ramanujan Number

testcase.name: testHamming_Num_1
testcase.system-out:
Hamming Number
Definition: Hamming numbers are nums of form: Hamming_Num = 2^a * 3^b * 5^c where a, b, c greater than equal to 0
900 is a Hamming number. (Also known as Ugly number)

testcase.name: testGoldbach_Num_1
testcase.system-out:
Goldbach Number Definition: Goldbach number is a positive even integer that can be expressed as sum of two odd primes. The pair of the two prime numbers whose sum express the given even number is called the Goldbach partition of the even number.
The Prime Partition for the given number is: 7 and 73 13 and 67 19 and 61 37 and 43
80 is a Goldbach Number with the above Prime Pair partition.

testcase.name: testGoldbach_Num_2
testcase.system-out:
Goldbach Number Definition: Goldbach number is a positive even integer that can be expressed as sum of two odd primes. The pair of the two prime numbers whose sum express the given even number is called the Goldbach partition of the even number.
Invalid input: You've either entered a negative or odd number

testcase.name: testGoldbach_Num_3
testcase.system-out:
Goldbach Number Definition: Goldbach number is a positive even integer that can be expressed as sum of two odd primes. The pair of the two prime numbers whose sum express the given even number is called the Goldbach partition of the even number.
2 is not a Goldbach Number. Did not find a prime partition for the given number.

testcase.name: testEmirp_Num_1
testcase.system-out:
Emirp Number
Definition: Emirp Number is a prime number that results in another prime number when its digits are reversed.
991 is an Emirp Number as: 991 is a prime number and its reverse 199 is also a prime number.

testcase.name: testEmirp_Num_2
testcase.system-out:
Emirp Number
Definition: Emirp Number is a prime number that results in another prime number when its digits are reversed.
625 is not a prime number hence cannot be an Emirp number

testcase.name: testEmirp_Num_3
testcase.system-out:
Emirp Number
Definition: Emirp Number is a prime number that results in another prime number when its digits are reversed.
43 is not an Emirp number as its reverse is not a prime number. 43 itself is a Prime Number.
